traits.Amphibious: The triton can breathe air and water.
traits.Summon Water Weird (Recharges after a Sh: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons 1d4 water weirds. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

actions.Multiattack: The triton makes two attacks using Wave Touch and casts ray of frost.
actions.Wave Touch: Melee Spell Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) cold damage.
actions.Ray of Frost (Cantrip): Ranged Spell Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the triton's next turn.
